'''High-Pressure Water Vents''' are an underwater exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]].

They can spray out underwater currents. If the player has the '''Armored Crab Shield''' from a [[Xenochromatic Creature#Xenochromatic Armored Crab|Xenochromatic Armored Crab]], they can avoid being carried away and resist the current.
